About the Company: Alkali Metals Ltd is engaged in the business of manufacturing sodium derivatives, pyridine derivatives and a range of fine chemicals, based on related chemistry. The company developed the technology for sodium metal based on in-house R&D capabilities and this was an achievement, considering various hazards in the development and manufacture of the same. They also have the distinction of developing technology for the manufacture of sodium metal for usage in fast breeder nuclear reactors for power generation and developed technologies for several derivatives based on sodium metal, picoline and various other cyclic compounds.
